name: Nine Mannequin's Morris
description:
Nine Mannequin's Morris - another #ue4jam #visualart #experiment

This was made between August 9th and August 13th specifically for the 2019 EpicGames Summer #ue4jam :)

if you like this, please let me know..Thank you!!
-Organic

Controls:
move/fire
T - cinematic camera
ESC - menu/settings/exit
